item.title: By: Black Girls and Mirrors: A Review of ‘Starkeisha’ (2022) – Luna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: Black Girls and Mirrors: A Review of ‘Starkeisha’ (2022) – Luna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] are prominent in my memory. Versions of Beyoncé dance-off in one of her Pepsi commercials (2013), Spellling reposes in a photo series by Catalina Xavlena (2018), Red and Adelaide face-off in Us (dir. Jordan Peele, […]
